name: O'Fishal Fishing
description:
A Bubbled Blaster like game where your goal is to turn in fish that you catch for Sea Shells to be able to buy better Fishing Rods. Buy the Fishing Rod 3000 and catch the Final Fish to be able to win the game!

This game was designed to be also played on Phone. If played on PC make sure to try it on your mobile! (On touch spawns ball making phone version impossible will update after game jam)

!-Note-!  Not sure why but post build on WEBGL version broke both video tutorials. You may find the tutorials here 

and here
